text: applications by two corporations for, in the first instance, orders under s 411 of the corporations act 2001 (cth) that they convene meetings of their members to consider and, if thought fit, agree to a scheme of arrangement

ultimate objective of demerging media and gaming businesses carried on by one company into media business to be carried on by it and gaming business to be carried on by the other company (recently formed for the purpose)
financial assistance for the acquisition of shares, name change, reduction of capital
